welcome_message_body: Welcome to Henderson, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer!

restaurants.name: Pampa Mia
restaurants.description: Pampa Mia is a restaurant located in Henderson.
restaurants.address: Florida Y Moreno, 6465 Henderson, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: La Espiga De Oro
restaurants.description: La Espiga De Oro is a bakery located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Henderson Executive Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Mc Carran International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal of Mc Carran International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Air Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves small charter flights and private aircrafts, providing a convenient and efficient option for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boulder City Airport provides services for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boulder City Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
